name: Redemption Spa
introduction: At Redemption, we've harnessed the soothing power of the ocean in everything we do, from dynamic flotation treatments to revitalizing deep sea algae wraps, using the finest products made with natural, organic ingredients.
longDescription: If vacation for you isn't complete without the ultimate form of self-care, our spa will be your second home. From massages so good they'll make you question life itself, to a mudroom that will revitalize your body and soul, we call it Redemption for a reason. Our Thermal Suite includes a mud room, salt room, sauna, steam room, hot and cold plunge pools and heated marble hammam benches — so many ways to reveal a new version of you.
needToKnows: In order to relax and prepare before your treatment, please check-in 15 minutes prior to your treatment start time
Cancellation policy: Spa treatments are only fully refundable if they are canceled at least 24 hours in prior to the start of the booked treatment.

treatments.name: Recovery Salt Stone Massage
treatments.description: Enhanced by aroma-infused body oil, a curated range of pink Himalayan salt stones are worked over your body and deep into the muscles—getting into areas of tension and persuading the muscles to release trapped and pent-up energy. It’s an uplifting experience with a glamorous touch of pink.
treatments.introduction: Using pink Himalayan salt stones, this soothing massage couples with the salt’s curative powers to penetrate muscles at a deeper level.

treatments.name: Awakening Bamboo Massage
treatments.description: Warmed stalks of bamboo are rolled over your muscles to help lengthen and stretch parts of the body where tension is generally stored. Working deep into the belly of the muscles for ultimate relief, this massage is ideal for super-active Sailors who gave a little too much to yesterday’s shore-side biking adventure. You can choose from 50, 75, or 100 minutes.
treatments.introduction: Roll and glide all your stress away with this therapeutic massage using heated bamboo stalks.

treatments.name: Deliverance Hot Mineral Massage
treatments.introduction: Invigorate yourself with our full-body treatment performed on the revolutionary amber and quartz crystal bed.

treatments.name: Atonement Deep Tissue Massage
treatments.description: Our deep-pressure massage is great for a post-workout remedy or anyone looking for a deep, penetrative experience. Customized with organic oils, this massage focuses on areas of tension to release toxins and restore the body. You can choose from 50, 75, or 100 minutes.
treatments.introduction: A deep-pressure massage focusing on alleviating tense muscles, increasing mobility and circulation.

treatments.name: Absolution Quartz Bed Massage
treatments.introduction: Sore, aching muscles are worked away with this restorative treatment—using amber and quartz poultices to dissolve knots and ease tensions.

treatments.name: Salvation Swedish Massage
treatments.introduction: You're the choreographer in this Swedish-style massage aimed to relieve tension, stimulate circulation and induce relaxation.

treatments.name: Couple's Salvation Swedish Massage
treatments.description: Enhanced by the use of ocean-inspired aroma oils, our customized, Swedish-style couple's massage focuses on relieving tension, stimulating blood circulation and overall relaxation. You can choose from 50, 75, or 100 minutes
treatments.introduction: You're the choreographer in this Swedish-style massage, customized to relieve tension, stimulate circulation and induce relaxation.

treatments.name: Couple's Awakening Bamboo Massage
treatments.description: Warmed stalks of bamboo are rolled over you and your partner's muscles, to help lengthen and stretch parts of the body where tension is generally stored. Working deep into the belly of the muscles for ultimate relief, this massage is ideal for super-active Sailors who gave a little too much to yesterday’s shore-side biking adventure.
treatments.introduction: Couples can roll and glide all their stress away with this therapeutic massage using bamboo stalks.

treatments.name: Couple's Atonement Deep Tissue Massage
treatments.description: Our deep-pressure massage is great for a post workout remedy or anyone looking for deep tissue repair. Customized with fragrant, ocean-inspired oils, this massage is both healing and restorative. You can choose from 50, 75, or 100 minutes.
treatments.introduction: A deep-pressure massage focusing on alleviating tense muscles, increased mobility and circulation.

treatments.name: Resurrection Acupuncture Consultation
treatments.description: If you’re looking to dip your toe in the proverbial water first, our onboard, board-certified acupuncturist offers complimentary consultations. The service is rooted in ancient medicine and is proven to alleviate discomfort from migraines to joint pain.
treatments.introduction: Treat a myriad of conditions from stress to chronic body pain with the ancient practice of acupuncture.

treatments.name: Resurrection Acupuncture
treatments.description: If you’re looking to dip your toe in the proverbial water first, our onboard, board-certified acupuncturist offers complimentary consultations. The service is rooted in ancient medicine and is proven to alleviate discomfort from migraines to joint pain.
treatments.introduction: Treat a myriad of conditions from stress to chronic body pain with the ancient practice of acupuncture.

treatments.name: Rejuvenating Technology Facial
treatments.description: This BIOTEC facial treatment is where groundbreaking technology meets active ingredients and a transformative touch. Using oxygen, light therapy and galvanic stimuli, our curated technology-based treatments target hydration, anti-aging, enlarged pores and skin texture issues—producing visibly healthy and energized skin. Feel free to go by Redemption Spa or contact Sailor Services and book a complimentary consultation to get an idea of what could benefit your skin.
treatments.introduction: A supersonic, super-customizable BIOTEC facial treatment to take your skin to the next level.

treatments.name: Restoration Pro-Collagen Age-Defying Facial
treatments.description: This age-defying facial — which comes with a hand, arm and scalp massage — entails our facialist hydrating and smoothing fine lines through the incorporation of marine-charged Padina Pavonica, which helps achieve nourished and young-looking skin.
treatments.introduction: While you can’t technically stop aging, you can gently nudge it off.

treatments.name: Skin Renew Facial
treatments.description: Restore cell health and get a natural glow with this hands-on treatment. You'll leave with smoother, plumper, more luminous skin — and a little je ne sais quoi that leaves people whispering in your wake.
treatments.introduction: Our custom facial uses premium, clean ingredients from science-based skincare brand Grown Alchemist. It's like getting a facelift, minus the surgery.

treatments.name: Three-Step Reclamation Body Treatment
treatments.description: This 3-step, full-body detoxifying treatment consists of polishing, wrapping and massaging the body to perfection. Starting with a lavender seaweed salt scrub for exfoliation and followed by a seaweed mask and wrap for circulation — the treatment ends with a back or full-body massage.
treatments.introduction: A self-care countdown for the ages — 1: exfoliate, 2: mask, and 3: massage it out.

treatments.name: Three-Step Nourishment Body Treatment
treatments.description: This 3-step, full-body nourishing treatment consists of polishing, wrapping and massaging the body to complete hydration. It starts with a lavender sea salt and samphire body polish, followed by an oat-milk body wrap to soothe. The treatment then ends with a restorative back or full-body massage.
treatments.introduction: A hydrating and nourishing full-body treatment, perfect after a day (or many) spent in the sun.
